reviews.review_msg: Lecture may be disorganized but content is great. Ask him detailed questions and suggestions about what to do, how to do it, and the grading rubric. Communicate with him because he wants you to succeed and is VERY understanding. Go to office hours & ask for help. Graded by 3 papers, rubric is given. Ask for what each section of the rubric implies.

Class itself is easy(A- avg). Just 3 papers. However, Dr. Campbell is disorganized and it seems like he puts together lectures 10min before the class starts. A lecture could be anywhere from 3-30 slides. Slides have 1-3 vague short sentence bullet points. His expectations are unclear. The assignment syllabus is bare, not uploaded until week due.
